resources.string: If TransLoc is available for your transit agency and it is not listed in the dropdown. It may be the case that your agency has not opted-in to enable the TransLoc OpenAPI. Please contact your local transit agency and ask about enabling OpenAPI access for TransLoc to use this application. It could also be the case that the agency does not support arrival times.
No data connection. Please make sure your data connection is enabled and try again.
